author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content: Hello, We are creating new nodes which will have both the EL and CL running at their latest releases. We plan to move over to using this new environment after the bellatrix upgrade but before the  actual merge happens (between sep6th and sep 10th). My question is , can we still continue to use our current nodes that has just the EL- geth (no CL) until a few days before the merge actually happens  and then switch over to the nodes that runs CL and EL?

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Yes but you should closely monitor total difficulty in case the TTD comes sooner than expected; presumably your stand-alone EL/geth is an older version w/o knowledge of the merge TTD, in which case those nodes will remain on PoW.
